content.question: Which of the following are safe ways to calm an adult showing distress? (Select all that apply)

answers.option: Encourage slow, deep breathing and provide reassurance calmly.
Listen actively without judgment and acknowledge feelings.
Force them to stop shaking or crying immediately.
Ignore their emotional state and focus only on tasks.

content.correct: Correct! Calm reassurance and active listening are effective PFA techniques.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answers are: Encourage slow breathing and listen actively.
